sentences.en: Any seafarer working ship has suffered infectious illness, mentioned by laws , which is likely cause infection.
sentences.cn: 八船上其他共同工作人患有法定传染病, 有传染之虞者.

sentences.en: Every seafarer has a right to decent working and living conditions on board ship.
sentences.cn: 每一海员均有权获得体面的船上工作和生活条件.

sentences.en: Every seafarer has a right to fair terms of employment.
sentences.cn: 每一海员均有权获得公平的就业条件.

sentences.en: Every seafarer has the right to a safe and secure workplace that complies with safety standards.
sentences.cn: 每一海员均有权享有符合安全标准的安全且受保护的工作场所.

sentences.en: Holding a forged seafarer certificate or undertaking duty in a faked name.
sentences.cn: 三持用伪造船员证件或冒名顶替执行职务者.

sentences.en: In all ships, electric light should be provided in the seafarer accommodation.
sentences.cn: 在所有船舶里, 应为船员起居舱室配备电灯.

sentences.en: Incompetence a seafarer because of injury or illness.
sentences.cn: 三因伤病无法继续担任船员.

sentences.en: The employer who terminates the contract in accordance with previous paragraph shall give the seafarer notice.
sentences.cn: 雇用人依前项规定终止雇佣契约时,须以书面通知船员.

sentences.en: The Estonians have always been seafarers.
sentences.cn: 爱沙尼亚人总是在海上漂泊。

sentences.en: The new century international seafarer employment market has a huge developing potential and prospect.
sentences.cn: 新世纪的国际船员劳务市场具有十分巨大的发展潜力和开发前景.

sentences.en: The State of nationality of the seafarer should promptly notify the seafarer's next of kin.
sentences.cn: 海员的国籍国应即通知海员最近的亲属.

sentences.en: This Regulation does not affect any other legal remedies that a seafarer may seek.
sentences.cn: 本规则不影响海员可能寻求的任何其他法律救济.

sentences.en: This Regulation shall apply to every seafarer employed under a crew agreement.
sentences.cn: 本规例适用于每一名根据船员协议受雇的海员.

sentences.en: Violation of mandatory provisions specified in the seafarer service book.
sentences.cn: 二违反船员服务规则应遵守事项者.

sentences.en: Withdrawal of the seafarer service book for three months or more up to two years.
sentences.cn: 四收回船员服务手册:三个月至二年.
